name: DragonCrash
description:
Experience this action packed battle arena game that is DragonCrash! Select from 4 unique dragons and 1 of the 5 different game modes, then battle against or with your friends online! Select from the fast lighting shooting manta dragon or the toxic shooting wind reflecting moth dragon! Create interesting combinations and different strategies with the unique abilities of each dragon. Go through matchmaking or create private games with your friends!

Try out the Hunt mode where you or your team attempts to gather enough gems to capture the landing zone in a fun mixture of treasure gathering and king of the hill combat! Or perhaps the free for all only Juiced mode where you gain points for killing the other players while carrying the super gem or kill the super dragon. Play the Kill Confirmed mode in team or free for all where you grab the gem that the dragons you kill in order to score points!


Features
  • 4 unique dragons!
  • 5 game modes!
  • 8 power-ups!
  • Multiple Levels!
